scripts.serve-with-dev-data: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore --import ../backup/firestore/firestore-bk
scripts.serve-with-local-data: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore --import ../backup/local/firestore_export
scripts.migrate-dev-data: gcloud firestore export gs://cvoxel-dev.appspot.com/firestore-bk && gsutil -m cp -r gs://cvoxel-dev.appspot.com/firestore-bk /Users/kantarofujimori/workspace/cvoxel/cvoxel_backend/backup/firestore/
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore
